en.latex:
Identify the restrictions in the following expression:

\( \frac{1}{x+7}-\frac{x^2+2}{x} \)
en.html:
Identify the restrictions in the following expression:

\( \frac{1}{x+7}-\frac{x^2+2}{x} \)

af.latex:

\( \frac{1}{x+7}-\frac{x^2+2}{x} \)
